message: I propose we divide the money 7000 for me and 3000 for you. Remember, with each round, the value of money decreases.
I think a 60/40 split is fairer, considering the inflation we'll both face in the next round. It's a good deal for both of us.
Considering the inflation, I suggest we equally divide the money, each receiving $5000. This ensures fairness and prevents any potential loss in value for either party.
